post.title: Between Performance or Personalization, ALs Sports chose both.
post.content:
Following the migration to deco.cx, AL's Sports experienced an immediate boost in conversion rates, contrary to the typical dip that often follows major platform changes.

"We expected there to be essentially a slight lull before we recovered," Riley explained. "We instantly saw a conversion rate boost. We instantly saw increased organic traffic from our website."

This improved performance translated directly to the bottom line. Following the implementation of deco.cx, AL's Sports achieved a 50% increase in revenue growth compared to their initial projections.
